tool_description: Transcribes audio and video recordings of witness interviews and statements into searchable text format for investigation analysis.

incident_id.description: Unique incident identifier to associate transcription with

participant_names.description: Names of people in the recording

error_messages: Invalid incident ID: Incident ID must correspond to an existing investigation case.
Invalid recording type: Must be either 'audio' or 'video'.
Invalid duration: Recording duration must be a positive number greater than 0.
Too many participants: Maximum 10 participants can be tracked in single recording.
Recording too long: Maximum recording duration is 180 minutes (3 hours).
Missing participant information: At least one participant name must be provided.
usage: Provide incident_id, recording_type, recording_duration, participant_names array, and transcriber_name. Creates text transcript from audio/video recordings for investigation purposes.

transcript_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated transcript

word_count.description: Total word count of the transcript

review_required.description: Whether human review is recommended for accuracy
